titles.title: A bill for the relief of Donald C. Pence.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.
Senate Committee on Armed Services discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: 1/24/2005--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to Donald C. Pence in compensation for the failure of the Department of Veterans Affairs to pay dependency and indemnity compensation for a specified period to his now deceased mother.
